long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By using the EasyForce you can Export/Query/Delete any object data in one click.
Normally if we want to query any records we need to switch to developer console, but using this extension we can easy query any object data in any salesforce site without switching to other pages.

In addition to the above, this Extension have the following additional features.
1. You can delete any object data in one click by providing simple SOQL.
2. You can Run your custom script like as anonymous window from any salesforce site .
3. This extension will work  both Classic and Lightning modes.

Updates:
1. UI modifications.
2. Added Loader
3. Added Fieldname suggesting functionality while writing SOQL
4. Including Debug log search and delete functionalities

By using this functionality we can search with keywords, where we have used in code and also we can delete all the logs.

Updates:
1. You can download Individual Logs
